channel.title: How do i make shop keepers sell certain things?
channel.description:
how do i make shop keepers sell certain things?
Lothy edit: Title fixed. Avoid putting ~~~ and other symbols in your title in future.

item.title: How do i make shop keepers sell certain things?
item.dc:creator: @gmaster1440 gmaster1440
item.description:
@gmaster1440 wrote:

wowâ€¦lol

just use this, its so much easier and noob friendly: @ECHO OFF TITLE Shop Maker! ECHO. :shopcfg SET /P ShopID=Shop ID? SET /P ShopName=Shop Name? SET /P Sell=Sell (Usually 1)? SET /P Buy=Buy (Usually 1)? SET string=shop = %ShopID% %ShopName% %Sell% %Buy% :additem SET /P Item=Item Number: SET /P Amount=Amount: SET string=%string% %Item% %Amount% SET /P itemagain=Add another item (y/n)? @if %itemagain%==y GOTO additem SET /P NpcID=Shopkeeper ID? SET /P CoordX=Shopkeeper Coord X? SET /P CoordY=Shopkeeper Coord Y? SET /P Height=Shopkeeper Height? SET /P RangeX1=Shopkeeper Range X1? SET /P RangeY1=Shopkeeper Range Y1? SET /P RangeX2=Shopkeeper Range X2? SET /P RangeY2=Shopkeeper Range Y2? SET /P WalkType=Shopkeeper Walk Type? SET /P Description=Shopkeeper Description? SET autospawn=spawn = %NpcID% %CoordX% %CoordY% %Height% %RangeX1% %RangeX2% %RangeX2% %RangeY2% %WalkType% %Description% SET client1=} else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { SET client2= PutNPCCoords = true; >> "Shops.txt" SET client3= WanneShop = %ShopID%; >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO %string% >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt" ECHO Add that line to shops.cfg. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO %autospawn% >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt" ECHO Add that line to autospawn.cfg. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. >> "Shops.txt" ECHO. ECHO %client1% >> "Shops.txt" ECHO %client2% >> "Shops.txt" ECHO %client3% >> "Shops.txt" ECHO >> "Shops.txt" ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt" ECHO Add this lines to client.java with your shops. >> "Shops.txt" ----------Shop Logs---------- >> "Shops.txt" echo. >> "Shops.txt" goto menu SET /P Again=Make another Shop(y/n)? @if %again%==y GOTO shopcfg
